claim_text: Real operational problems identified by mission owners
Founders and operators matched at The Combine
Our national security demands better technology, faster.
Operators face accelerating threats. Founders struggle to access real problems. Traditional acquisition moves slowly, trapped by legacy overhead and siloed processes.
Innovation must happen next to the mission — not behind a desk.
Merge creates a new model: A rapid, informed, operator-driven cycle where real problems translate into real prototypes and real deployments.
One week, in person. Funded and emerging teams get real validation from operators and mission owners close to the requirement.

Leave with decisions, next steps, and champions
We co-found and build ventures born from validated problem sets—backed by operators, technical builders, and deployment partners.

Every venture starts with real, operator-validated needs.
SigmaBlox was the most valuable week we've spent in defense tech. The connections and validation we received accelerated our roadmap by months.
Merge helped us validate the problem and build with the right operators. We went from concept to field testing in under two months.
This is the first ecosystem where engineers and mission owners actually solve problems together. The collaboration model is transformative.
